original_text: Then the angel showed me a river. It had water that gives true life to people. The water shone like clean glass. The river of water started from the throne where God and the Lamb sit to rule. It ran from the throne 2 along the middle of the city's biggest street. I saw a tree that was growing on each side of the river. It is the tree that gives people true life. It has 12 different kinds of fruit, a new fruit every month. The tree's leaves are like medicine. They make people of every nation well again.
korean_text: 또 그가 수정 같이 맑은 생명수의 강을 내게 보이니 하나님과 및 어린 양의 보좌로부터 나와서

sentences.original_text: Then the angel showed me a river
It had water that gives true life to people
sentences.korean_translation: 그 강에는 사람들에게 진정한 생명을 주는 물이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The water shone like clean glass
The river of water started from the throne
where God and the Lamb sit to rule
It ran from the throne along the middle of the city's biggest street
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 옥좌에서 나와 도시의 가장 큰 거리 중앙을 따라 흘렀습니다

sentences.original_text: I saw a tree that was growing on each side of the river
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 강 양쪽에 자라나는 나무를 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: It is the tree that gives people true life
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사람들에게 진정한 생명을 주는 생명나무입니다

sentences.original_text: It has 12 different kinds of fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나무에는 12가지 다른 종류의 열매가 있습니다

sentences.original_text: The tree's leaves are like medicine
They make people of every nation well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그 잎사귀들은 모든 민족의 사람들을 다시 건강하게 만듭니다
